content: this breezy crochet hoodie is a lovely summer top to layer or wear alone perfect 6 granny squares are made easily thanks to red heart all in one granny square simply create your motifs then stitch them together to complete the garment solid sections are worked in half_double_crochet lace openwork and single_crochet techniques pretty edging gives your top a professional quality while handy ties at neck and under the bust adjust for your best fit materials red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m xs/s/m/l xl/2/3xl 4/5xl contrast a green scream 2003 2 2 2 balls contrast b pink punch 2001 2 2 2 balls contrast c hot stuff 2000 2 2 2 balls finished chest xs/s/m/l 48 101 5 cm xl/2/3xl 60 112 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm
